keyword: calories in a matcha green tea latte
title: Calories in a Matcha Green Tea Latte
meta_description: Learn calories in a matcha green tea latte (about 190 kcal per 12 oz serving), plus carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in a Matcha Green Tea Latte
assumptions: 12 fl oz serving with 2% milk, 2 tsp matcha powder, sweetened with simple syrup; no whipped cream.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, milk type, portion size, added sugars, and preparation method. Check labels or recipes when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard 12 oz matcha green tea latte provides ~190 kcal, mostly from milk and added sugar.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged or cafe items.

tweaks.label: Use almond milk instead of 2% milk

faqs.q: How many calories in a matcha green tea latte?
faqs.a: About 190 kcal for a standard 12 oz serving with 2% milk.

faqs.q: Is a matcha latte high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 28 g sugars per serving due to added sweeteners; opt for unsweetened to reduce.

faqs.q: What are the macros for a matcha green tea latte?
faqs.a: â‰ˆ30 g carbs, 8 g protein, 5 g fat; matcha adds antioxidants but minimal calories.

faqs.q: How does milk type affect calories in a matcha latte?
faqs.a: Whole milk adds ~30 kcal vs. 2%; non-dairy like almond milk subtracts ~20 kcal.

faqs.q: Does matcha powder add many calories?
faqs.a: Only about 10-15 kcal per tsp; most calories come from milk and sugar in the latte.
